name: ChallengeThem
description:
You're a powerful swortman.For improving yourself,challenge strong monsters seem to be Invincible.But they must have weakpoints!

A TopDown2D&Beat'em up game built for My First Game Jam winter 2023

It's my first time to create pxiel art on my own.So maybe it's not good enough.I try my best(.

The game is basically finished except for some small details.I will fill them later.

Credits:

bgm by Sara Garrard,

SFX by leohpaz

Thanks and sorry for my bad english(
